short_summary: Aviation Replacement Parts for the CT-142 Dash 8 aircraft by the Department of National Defence (Canada).
description: Aviation, Defence, Aerospace, Defense, Supply, Arrangement, Government, Aircraft, Canada
duration_in_months: Possibly longer than 1 month, check the Details section.
full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement

**Aviation Replacement Parts for the CT-142 Dash 8**

**Notice of Proposed Procurement**

The Department of National Defence (DND) intends to acquire aviation replacement parts for the CT-142 Dash 8 aircraft. The solicitation number for this procurement is W8485-237525/A. 

**Solicitation Details**

* Title: Aviation Replacement Parts for the CT-142 Dash 8
* Solicitation status: Closed, as the tender closing date has passed.
* Delivery region: Manitoba
* Contracting entity: Department of National Defence
* End-user entity: Department of National Defence
* Contact information:
	+ Name: Paula J. Oakley
	+ Title: MCpl PJ Oakley
	+ Email: PJ.OAKLEY@forces.gc.ca
	+ Postal address: 101 Colonel By Dr, Ottawa, ON K1A 0K2, Canada

**Notice Requirements**

This request for proposal is open only to qualified supply arrangement holders of Supply Arrangement W8485-184741 series. The RFP documents will be e-mailed directly by the Contracting officer to the qualified SA holders who are invited to bid on this requirement.

**Notice Information**

* Among the five invited companies, four have already been qualified for an organization depending on diverse methodologies. This shows highly special supply arrangements being applied mainly in accordance with military operations details comprehension.
